name: expressive
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 showing what someone thinks or feels: an expressive face expressive hands be expressive of something formal
showing a particular feeling or characteristic: The final movement of Beethoven's Ninth Symphony is expressive of joy.

showing your feelings in your voice, behavior, or appearance: His singing was beautiful and expressive.
